name: Turbo Tunnel
description: Avoid obstacles as you accelerate through an endless tunnel of pain and destruction. What could go wrong?
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 or Newer Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 (equivalent or better) Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 (equivalent or better) Storage: 400 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 (equivalent or better) Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 480 (equivalent or better) Storage: 400 MB available space
